summary: Frontend testing completed for 3 major refactoring tasks: P1 (LocationModal, useSubcategoryModal extraction), P2 (shimmer loading), P3 (React.memo optimizations). All features working correctly.

homepage_loads_correctly_desktop.notes: Desktop homepage loads with 4-column grid, header with Sign In/Up, Post Listing, category pills, search bar, location selector.

homepage_loads_correctly_mobile.notes: Mobile homepage loads with 2-column grid, circular category icons, search input, location selector, bottom navigation.

desktop_header_with_category_pills.notes: Category pills visible: All, Auto & Vehicles, Properties, Electronics, Phones & Tablets, Home & Furniture, Fashion & Beauty, Jobs & Services.

mobile_header_with_categories.notes: Mobile header shows circular category icons with labels.

listings_grid_with_memoized_cards.notes: ListingsGrid component renders correctly with data-testid='listings-grid'. ListingCard uses React.memo with custom areEqual comparison function.

location_modal_functionality.notes: LocationModal opens from both mobile and desktop, shows 'Select Location' title, 'Browse locations...' picker, 'All Locations' option with checkmark.

subcategory_modal_on_mobile.notes: Clicking category on mobile opens SubcategoryModal showing 'View All Electronics' and full list of subcategories with counts.

category_page_skeleton_loading.notes: CategoryPageSkeleton displays shimmer effect during data fetch with header, subcategory chips, filter row, and card grid placeholders.

profile_page_skeleton_loading.notes: ProfileSkeleton displays with avatar circle, name/email placeholders, stats row, and menu items during loading.

messages_page_skeleton_loading.notes: MessagesSkeleton displays with header, search bar, filter tabs, and message list item placeholders with avatars.

sellers_page_skeleton_loading.notes: BusinessDirectorySkeleton displays with header, search bar, category chips, and business cards with cover/logo/content placeholders.

index_tsx_reduced_to_473_lines.notes: Main home screen index.tsx confirmed at 473 lines after extracting LocationModal and useSubcategoryModal hook.
